data.text:
@gillianoberholzer

Just to break it up...

Please create a Branch Called "Main" for each of the below Companies:

Franco Upliftment Agencies
Reyn Varkevisser Upliftment
Jossie Wiggill Upliftment


I will move the relevant users to the new Company and Branch once you are done.

You will then have to update the users to admin role and at the same of the update the user's new company and branch will be filtered through to CW on the update.

@neilbosworth @cobuspienaar
